pattern.name: My Site
pattern.author: Martijn van Welie
pattern.problem: User have a need to define their own page elements
pattern.context: Typically used in a . Or in e-commerce sites where users have their own portions of the site.
pattern.pattlet: Create a part of the site that belongs to a user and that is controlled by that user.
pattern.solution: First log in and then present a customized personal section. Usually the pages are built up using 'modules' that the users has selected. Each module is a . Users can change the which modules they want and in which layout and graphical presentation.
